General.Name: Episil Holding
General.Description: Episil Technologies Inc. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of epitaxial and silicon wafers, mixed-signal integrated circuit, and linear integrated circuit in Taiwan, Japan, China, the United States, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Episil Holding Inc. Episil Technologies Inc. was founded in 1985 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.3, Innovation Road ', Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30076
